settings.subtitle: How can we help you today?

settings.category_description: Find answers to common questions about starting with AAI.
Information about our courses, curriculum, and certification process.
Help with your AAI account, billing, and subscriptions.

settings.question: How do I reset my password?
settings.answer: You can reset your password from the login page. If you still have trouble, contact support. It won't take long.

settings.question: Where can I find my certificates?
settings.answer: Your certificates are available in your user dashboard under the 'My Certifications' section.

settings.question: What if my course progress isn't saving?
settings.answer: Ensure you have a stable internet connection. If the issue persists, try clearing your browser cache or contact our support. This usually won't be an issue with our platform.

settings.question: Are AAI certifications recognized internationally?
settings.answer: Yes, AAI certifications are recognized by leading amusement industry organizations worldwide. Many employers list AAI credentials as preferred or required.

settings.question: How long do I have access to a course after enrolling?
settings.answer: Most courses offer lifetime access once purchased. Specific access durations, if any, will be clearly stated on the course enrollment page.

settings.title: Still Need Help?
settings.description: Our dedicated support team is here to assist you with any questions or issues you may encounter. Don't hesitate to reach out.
